## PuzzleSession.getCellContents() method

Gets the [contents](./ts-sudoku-lib.icellcontents.md) for a specified cell.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCellContents(spec: string | IRowColumn): Result<{
        cell: ICell;
        contents: ICellContents;
    }>;
```

spec


</td><td>

string \| [IRowColumn](./ts-sudoku-lib.irowcolumn.md)


</td><td>

A `string` ([CellId](./ts-sudoku-lib.cellid.md)<!-- -->), [RowColumn](./ts-sudoku-lib.irowcolumn.md) or [ICell](./ts-sudoku-lib.icell.md) describing the cell to be queried.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;{ cell: [ICell](./ts-sudoku-lib.icell.md)<!-- -->; contents: [ICellContents](./ts-sudoku-lib.icellcontents.md)<!-- -->; }&gt;

`Success` with the [cell description](./ts-sudoku-lib.icell.md) and [cell contents](./ts-sudoku-lib.icellcontents.md)<!-- -->, or `Failure` with details if an error occurs.
